header.subtitle: Support for investment and business projects since 2014.
header.desc: Comprehensive support — from idea to production launch, from business startup to obtaining licenses, loans and investments.
header.desc_short: Comprehensive support from idea to production launch for local and foreign investors.

about.title: About Us
about.desc: Since 2014, specialists of LLC 'HAYRAT UL ABROR' have been successfully supporting business projects in Uzbekistan from idea development to production launch. We help legal entities and individuals implement investment plans and develop business in the country.

services.title: Our Services
services.doc_desc: Charter documents, adjustment for long-term loans
services.design_desc: Equipment selection, drawings, project, LPI, PSD, estimates
services.finance_desc: Working with banks, collecting documents, obtaining loans
services.expertise_desc: Positive conclusion from the Center for Comprehensive Expertise
services.personnel_desc: Recruitment, training, staff registration, employment contracts

whyus.title: Why Choose Us?
whyus.goal: Our goal is complete client support at all stages: from idea to finished product output.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.address: Republic of Uzbekistan, Tashkent region, Parkent district, Krasnogorsk settlement, Oydin MFY, Poletaeva street house 55.
